# SentinelOS

[![forthebadge](https://forthebadge.com/images/badges/made-with-c-sharp.svg)](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/pt-br/languages/csharp)
[![forthebadge](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/pt-br/download/dotnet/6.0)
[![forthebadge](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://www.gocosmos.org/)
[![forthebadge](https://forthebadge.com/images/badges/license-mit.svg)](https://mit-license.org/)

The current project is a simple operating system developed in C# using the Cosmos, a OS development kit. The project is a simple operating system that has a simple interface and for now, it can handle some basic functions like file management, process management, and some other basic functions.

## Inspiration
SentinelOS was developed as an object of study for the operating systems discipline from the Computer Engineering course at the University of Taubat√©.

## Primary Objective

The primary objective is to develop a security protocol that can be used to protect the system from unauthorized access and potential threats. 
In order to achieve this, the system will have a simple interface that will allow the user to interact with the system and perform some basic functions.

## Features

### System Features (Lower Level)
- [x] File Management
- [x] Directory Management
- [x] Process Management
- [x] Task Management
- [x] Error Handling
- [x] Disk Management
- [ ] System Calls
- [ ] Memory Management
- [ ] Security Protocol

### User Features (Higher Level)
- [x] Desktop
- [x] Start Menu
- [x] Taskbar
- [x] Right-Click Menu
- [x] Mouse Support
- [ ] CRUD Operations on SysFiles
- [ ] File Explorer


### Apps (Higher Level)
- [X] Notepad
- [ ] Calculator
- [ ] Game
- [ ] Browser
